title: Control Set 1 Configuration
description: This FUNCTION_BLOCK is designed to configure control parameters for PI and PID controllers based on the given gains and time constants. It calculates proportional, integral, and derivative gains based on the user-defined input parameters and the selected control mode.
name: CONTROL_SET1

input.name: Kt
input.description: The gain factor that affects the control outputs.

input.name: Tt
input.description: The time constant used for calculating integral and derivative parameters.

input.name: PI
input.description: Boolean flag to indicate if a PI controller is used.

input.name: PID
input.description: Boolean flag to indicate if a PID controller is used.

input.name: P_K
input.description: Proportional gain for the basic control (default = 0.5).

input.name: PI_K
input.description: Proportional gain for the PI controller (default = 0.45).

input.name: PI_TN
input.description: Time constant for the integral part of the PI controller (default = 0.83).

input.name: PID_K
input.description: Proportional gain for the PID controller (default = 0.6).

input.name: PID_TN
input.description: Time constant for the integral part of the PID controller (default = 0.5).

input.name: PID_TV
input.description: Time constant for the derivative part of the PID controller (default = 0.125).

output.name: KP
output.description: Calculated proportional gain based on the selected controller.

output.name: TN
output.description: Calculated time constant for the integral component.

output.name: TV
output.description: Calculated time constant for the derivative component.

output.name: KI
output.description: Calculated integral gain based on KP and TN.

output.name: KD
output.description: Calculated derivative gain based on KP and TV.
